mapper.select: SELECT imported_statement_id as importedStatementId, import_datetime as importDateTime, link_user_id as linkUserId, link_account_identifier as linkAccountIdentifier, pdf_file_checksum as pdfFileChecksum, pdf_file_data as pdfFileData, status FROM imported_statement WHERE status = '#{statusCode}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imported_statement (import_datetime, link_user_id, link_account_identifier, pdf_file_checksum, pdf_file_data, status) VALUES (#{importDateTime}, #{linkUserId}, #{linkAccountIdentifier}, #{pdfFileChecksum}, #{pdfFileData}, #{status.statusCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE imported_statement SET import_datetime = #{importDateTime}, link_user_id = #{linkUserId}, link_account_identifier = #{linkAccountIdentifier}, pdf_file_checksum = #{pdfFileChecksum}, pdf_file_data = #{pdfFileData}, status = #{status.statusCode} WHERE imported_statement_id = #{importedStatementId}
